short_desc: Children's ministry is the avenue used to effectively instill character, a strong biblical foundation, and principles of the Lord Jesus Christ into kids ages 5 through 11
description: Calling all kids ages 5 through 11 years old.  Come have fun learning about the Lord Jesus at Noah’s Ark Children’s Church in the Learning Center every 2nd, 3rd, & 4th Sunday at 11:30am.
